actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT id, name,Status,rejectedReason,inserted_at as InsertedDate  FROM complaints_title where rightHolderUserId = '{{appsmith.store.rightHolderUserId}}' and complaints_title.name like '%{{Table1Copy.searchText || ""}}%' {{titleViewFilters.whereFilter}}
ORDER BY {{Table1Copy.sortOrder.column || 'complaints_title.inserted_at'}} {{Table1Copy.sortOrder.order || "DESC"}};
